column4: a peice of software I want to install says I need recent ver of X installed? Whats X and where do I get it?
what are you trying to install
search the repo for vnc, you'll see there is tightvnc available in the ubuntu repos
synaptic would be better in my view
I have vinagre, vino, tsclient, libgtk-vnc - but no tightvnc
do you want the server or the client
just viewer
install xtightvncviewer
from? synaptic? add/remove?
what version of ubuntu are you on
umm, ok, what do I do with that info?
what  version of ubuntu are you on ?
i got it with sudo aput-get install xtightvncviewer
right a.) 9.10 is unstable b.) the 9.10 channel is #ubuntu+1
do you now how to use the pastebin ?
Yes.
pastebin the output of lsb_release -a and uname -a please
I would like to find a vnc viewer that has scaling, and file transer be even better
pastebin the output of lsb_release -a and uname -a please
please provide the output I asked for
ok
never mind, I asked you to do the output of "lsb_release -a" and uname -a
